é»‘é­”æ³•ä¹‹patch-package

å…ˆçœ‹çœ‹å®˜æ–¹æ˜¯æ€ä¹ˆä»‹ç»çš„

patch-package lets app authors instantly make and keep fixes to npm dependencies. Itâ€™s a vital band-aid for those of us living on the bleeding edge.

Patches created by patch-package are automatically and gracefully applied when you use npm(>=5) or yarn.

No more waiting around for pull requests to be merged and published. No more forking repos just to fix that one tiny thing preventing your app from working.
